DOC.brief_summary: Goal study measure serum cholinesterase activity patient traumatic and/or burn injury admit emergency room use point-of- care-test system ( POCT ) . Serum cholinesterase activity , measure use POCT system , might play important role early diagnosis prediction patient outcome trauma-induced systemic inflammation .
DOC.brief_title: Point Care Testing Cholinesterase Activity During Burn- Polytrauma
DOC.criteria: sign write consent 18 year old severe trauma ( ISS > 15 ) burn injury ( 2. degree 15 % body surface 3 degree 10 % body surface ) SIRS fulfil inclusion criterion failure adhere
